== Main Inclusion Report for libotr ==

=== Requirements ===

 1. ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/libo/libotr/, available for all supported architectures
 2. ''Rationale:''
** Dependency of gaim-otr, which has been proposed for main inclusion.
 3. ''Security:''
** No CVE entries.
** No Secunia history.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
** Does not open any port.
 4. ''Quality assurance:''
** No open bugs in Debian.
** Active upstream.
 5. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>
 6. ''Dependencies:''
** All in main.
